title: Point of View
description: First person, second person, third person, what? Omniscient? Limited? What does it all mean? Point of view can be one of the most confusing aspects of novel writing to a beginner–or even a veteran novelist. Angela Hunt not only explains what it all means, but helps you understand the secret power behind point of view–how it can aid with suspense, characterization, and voice. She’ll help you choose point of view wisely and use it well.
author: Angela Elwell Hunt
